Designed for content creators, marketers, and business owners, this Notion resource provides ready-to-use prompts that generate professional social media copy for various platforms and purposes. Rather than spending hours crafting the perfect post or struggling with writer's block, you can leverage AI assistance to produce engaging, conversion-focused content in minutes. The prompts cover everything from attention-grabbing hooks to engagement-driving captions and platform-specific content strategies.

faqs.question: How do I get started with this template?
faqs.answer: After purchasing, you'll receive a Notion link containing all 139 prompts. Simply duplicate the template to your workspace, browse the organized categories, select a prompt that fits your need, copy it, paste it into ChatGPT, and use the AI-generated copy for your social media posts.

faqs.question: What's included in this template?
faqs.answer: The template includes 139 ChatGPT prompts specifically designed for social media copywriting, organized by platform and content type. You'll get prompts for hooks, captions, CTAs, hashtags, and various post formats, all in an easy-to-navigate Notion database that you can bookmark and reference anytime.

faqs.question: Can I customize this template?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Notion template is fully customizable. You can add your own prompts, modify existing ones to better fit your brand voice, create custom categories, add notes about which prompts work best for your audience, and organize the database in whatever way suits your workflow.

faqs.question: What are the main use cases?
faqs.answer: Primary use cases include generating daily social media posts across platforms, creating engagement-driving captions for product launches, developing platform-specific content strategies, overcoming writer's block during content creation sessions, and training AI to write in your brand's voice for consistent content output.
